name: Syrill the Brave
description:
Syrill the Brave is an old school type platformer game inspired by old games like  Super Wonder boy in Monster Land. The game is for anyone who enjoys a simple but fun platformer with simple controls.

Story:

The world is overrun with monsters and your quest if to destroy the final boss of  each world in order to restore peace and harmony again.

Features:

  • 5 unique worlds with a total of 25 fun platformer levels.
  • Each world has a challenging end boss to defeat. 
  • Simple controls. Jumping, running and swinging sword is all you need to know.
  • Option to modify XBOX controller or keyboard mapping. 

Note:

This game is best played on XBOX controller or keyboard.
